Description:
Location Is The Key
It ticks all the right boxes, with space, accommodation, great features and a fantastic location! Close to schools, shops and transport this beautifully presented property offers
4 large bedrooms with build in robes (master with spa ensuite and walk in robe) plus open study.
Furthermore is the combined formal lounge and dining area, large modern kitchen with 900 mm appliances hot plates and oven plus dishwasher adjoining meals and family area.
Sparkling central bathroom,
Rumpus room, double garage and lovely entertaining area or alfresco.
The list of other features is endless just to name few: 8 solar panels, monitored alarm system, CCTV security, landscaped low maintenance gardens and all set on a 559sqm approximately land.
Inspections will impress even the fussiest of buyers.
Disclaimer: Every precaution has been taken to establish the accuracy of the above informationbut it does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.

Description:
Generous Family Living
A rare opportunity to secure this large 4 bedroom family home within close proximity to all amenities. Only a short 30 min (approx.) drive to the CBD, walking distance to parks, schools and shops, makes this a must when making the next big family move. Comprising four generous sized bedrooms, master with WIR & en-suite and three remaining bedrooms also offering built in robes. Bright central bathroom with easy access from the living room and remaining bedrooms, large tiled meals area and a spacious lounge, perfect for any host to entertain. Heading outdoors, you're presented with a fully concreted outside entertaining area, with a spacious rear yard, boasting 418m2 (approx.) of land in total. Landscaped gardens front to rear, stone kitchen bench tops, gas ducted heating, cooling, intercom and remote DLUG are a few of the many extras available. An opportunity like this doesn't show up often. Don't delay and enquire today!

Description:
Modern Brick Home in Great Location
Offering a modern lifestyle and an abundant flow of natural light, this home is ideal for those looking for an open and inviting residence to occupy. Situated in this sought location this home is conveniently close to schools, shops, public transport, childcare facilities and freeway access.
Boasting 4 bedrooms with built in robes, 2 bathrooms, well appointed kitchen with Caesar stone bench tops and ample storage options.
Bright and spacious meals and family areas offer a versatile space to enjoy when entertaining.
Additional appointments include landscaped gardens, outdoor undercover entertaining area and a double garage with direct access to the home.

Description:
Well Designed Home Ideal For A Growing Family
This stunning near new residence was built to a very high standard with loads of upgraded features and offering a low maintenance lifestyle boasting a family friendly floor plan with a focus on easy living. Comprising of four large sized bedrooms with BIR (master with walk in robe and ensuite). With no less than 4 living areas this home will cater for a larger family. Open plan designed kitchen with Caesar stone bench tops overlooking the meal/dining area leading to the backyard with bi fold doors. Features include, high ceilings, split system cooling and down lights, low maintenance landscaped gardens both front and rear, double lock up garage with remote control. All this situated on a good sized allotment, and conveniently located close to Derrimut Village, parklands, local shops, schools, childcare central and also easy access to Western Ring Road. Inspect today to avoid disappointment.

Description:
SOLD AFTER FIRST OPEN BY NICK MAKROGLOU!
Those with an eye for detail will truly appreciate the quality and upgrades that come with this brilliant Derrimut residence that just oozes class. Upon entering through large double doors you will be mesmerised by the gleaming hardwood floors and the absolute perfect presentation and condition of the property. Comprising 4 bedrooms, the luxurious master featuring WIR and sensational ensuite featuring double vanity, stone benches, oversize shower and spa while the other 3 bedrooms offer BIRs and are serviced by another high standard bathroom. Georgeous Caesar stone kitchen with plenty of cupboard space, island bench, 900mm appliances and bi fold window for access to alfresco area when entertaining overlooks the large dining and living area. A lovely formal lounge room, theatre room, separate study and double garage with remote complete the home. Other features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, alarm, bulkheads, down lights, quality window furnishings including plantation shutters, high ceilings, high doors, triple stacker door to alfresco and low maintenance landscaped front and rear gardens that includes extensive artificial grass.
Insights: 4 Grosvenor Crescent, DERRIMUT VIC 3030 was last sold in 2013.

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU
Epitomising prestige and with great attention to detail this magical residence will quite simply leave you breathless. Incorporating both informal & formal living zones this custom made design just flows beautifully allowing for fantastic entertaining areas yet very private seperate study and sleeping quarters. Cook up a storm in the quality kitchen with stone benchtops, glass splashbacks and 900mm appliances that overlooks the living and dining areas and the extra oversized decked alfresco. Entertain the masses by opening up the two sets of triple stacker doors to create a massive indoor/outdoor entertaining space that spills into the large backyard. The master retreat is one of the best I have seen, offering more BIR space than even the biggest shopaholic will need and to die for ensuite with double vanity and an amazing double shower that stretches the entire length of the bathroom. Other features include separate lounge, kids retreat or convert to 5th bedroom , study, zoned ducted heating and refrigerated cooling, solar panel system, high ceilings, downlights, quality window furnishings including plantation shutters, landscaped front and rear gardens with sprinkler system, 2 x 5000L water tanks and double garage with remote and internal access and possible side access on this huge 650sqm corner block.
Insights: 1 Ludlow Court, DERRIMUT VIC 3030 was last sold in 2013.

AUCTION CANCELLED - SOLD NICK MAKROGLOU
This monstrous parcel of land of approximately 768sqm is worth almost $350,000 itself so as the title says you are getting the large house for less than $100,000. Description:
Build Your Dream Home
*Under Offer*
All enquirees welcome. Located in Brimbank Gardens Derrimut this block has a good frontage of 14m and a depth of 32m (448m2).
Brimbank Gardens is a planned community only 17km from the city with over 10 hectares of parklands.
This standard sized block located on flat land overlooks a park. This plot has convenient access to the western ring road via the deer pass by pass, is minutes from deer park train station and many amenities.
Happy to negotiate.

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU
This great residence offers a unique design perfectly suited to buyers with an extended family or with teenagers that enjoy their privacy. An expertly positioned retreat that you would not even know is there consists of a living area , bedroom with WIR and BIR ,full ensuite and access to a decked outside area . The home comprises an additional 3 bedrooms, 2 of which are serviced by the main bathroom and the master with WIR and ensuite with 1 and a half shower. Expansive open plan kitchen/dining / living area spills outside to the huge pergola area with built in sink that is perfect for entertaining. Other features include large separate lounge room and study, ducted heating, evaporative cooling , alarm, landscaped front and rear gardens, double garage with remote and rear roller door access, side access and the bonus of an additional steel garage/ workshed at the rear of this huge block of approximately 650sqm.

Description:
Impressive Home! Impressive Location!
Sale by Set Date 30/7/2013
In the heart of Derrimut and overlooking the park, tucked away in what is widely regarded as Derrimuts best position awaits this stunning residence. With a beautifully presented and practical floor plan, this home compromises a spacious open plan, central living area allowing for a beautiful flow of natural light, a kitchen with granite bench top, stainless steel appliances, with ample cupboard space which overlooks the meals/dining area. Also boasting 3 large bedrooms, master with walk in robe and ensuite with double vanity, followed by a further 2 bedrooms both with built in robes. Outdoors provides a pristine setting, perfect for outdoor entertaining all year round with stunning outdoor alfresco area. Extra inclusions: high ceilings, remote double garage, split system heating and cooling, alarm system, dishwasher & security camera. This home is designed at its best quality for easy low maintenance while being only meters from all of Derrimut
amenities including various shops and shopping Centre, schools, public transport and easy freeway access, this home is truly a delight to inspect and even better to move in and live in!
Inspections are must.

Description:
Generous Family Living
A rare opportunity to secure this large 4 bedroom family home within close proximity to all amenities. Only a short 15 min (approx.) drive to the CBD, walking distance to parks, schools and shops, makes this a must when making the next big family move. Comprising four generous sized bedrooms, master with WIR & en-suite and three remaining bedrooms also offering built in robes. Bright central bathroom with easy access from the living room and remaining bedrooms, large tiled meals area and a spacious lounge, perfect for any host to entertain. Heading outdoors, you're presented with a fully concreted undercover pergola, with a spacious rear yard, boasting 450m2 of land in total. Landscaped gardens front to rear, stone kitchen bench tops, gas ducted heating, cooling, intercom and remote DLUG are a few of the many extras available. An opportunity like this doesn't show up often. Do not delay and call today!

Description:
Open Cancelled- Contact Agent
Situated in one of the best locations Derrimut has to offer, this beautifully presented home meets all the needs of the common family while offering a lifestyle of ease, relaxation and peace. Enter this sophisticated home of space and comfort with 3 living areas including, formal lounge, cosy family room and rumpus room. Truly a chefs kitchen with stainless steel appliances, good size pantry and plenty of bench space, large dining area and a outdoor alfresco entertaining area. There are 4 good size bedrooms, master with walk in robe and ensuite. Long list of extras include: Ducted heating, split system cooling, double remote garage with drive through access and low maintenance gardens. An inspection is a must.
Disclaimer: Every precaution has been taken to establish the accuracy of the above information but it does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.
Cameron Vurovecz : 0431 945 737

BUILD OR SUBDIVIDE (STCA)

Description:
SOLD BY NICK MAKROGLOU!
Offering everything that is expected these days with a modern home this perfectly presented residence is an absolute credit to its current owners. Comprising of 4 spacious bedrooms with BIRs, master with WIR and ensuite, open plan kitchen and dining area, 2 large living areas and alfresco area that is perfect for entertaining. Other features include ducted heating, cooling, landscaped front and rear gardens, double garage with remote and bonus rear roller door access to the big backyard. With everything already done for you just move in an enjoy.
